title: SHA LA LA
lyrics:
Buntong teojineun iri mankunyo
Ssageuri jabaneoko
Nappeun yogeul haeboryeodaga
Geunyang dareul bwayo
Seuteureseubodan deureseu eob
Please don't kill my vibe



Dadeul eoryeobda hae shwipdamyeon geimiji

Chwegoga motdwae gwaenchana neodabge hae



Eojeye jjijiri naega anya

Oneureun bitnari I'm better now



Shintoburi

Come and get it

Come and get it

Come and get it

Bul bul buriya

Come and get it

Come and get it

Come and get it



Cheonjangeul ttulko nara shine a light

Neukkim itge shyalalla



Shintoburi

Come and get it

Come and get it

Come and get it

Bul bul buriya



Nado moreugetta

Jeonsaenge mwodeun bejjangi noldeut

Socheoreom salda gagetta

Chakhage sarara (inoma)

Nolbu shimbo eodi gagennya

Haengbokhaja eomma nuna gangbyeon salja

Usaengsuneun jigeumiya right now

Dangjang jim chaenggyeoseo tteonaja dalnala



Nan ije nunchigochi

Gudi boji anchi

Unchi itji matji

Neukkyeojini shyalalla an bwado bidio



Eojeye jjijiri naega anya

Oneure bitnari I'm better now



Shintoburi

Come and get it

Come and get it

Come and get it

Bul bul buriya

Come and get it

Come and get it

Come and get it



Cheonjangeul ttulko nara shine a light

Neukkim itge shyalalla



Shintoburi

Come and get it

Come and get it

Come and get it

Bul bul buriya



Banjjakbanjjak jageun byeori nae mam ane chumeul chwoyo

Gatabutahaji mayo

Nagachi (da gachi)

I bame kkeuteul jabgo fire



Bare bul buteotta

Deo yeolshimhi dallyeo gireum bueo da

Neoneun bujinhae bujinhae bujinhae raneun

Gwishin sshinnarak kkameokneun sori ssam ssameogeo

Eolssu joda pansori

Jeoldae haji ma nunchi bogi

Naeil ireun geokjeong mara jipijigi baekjeonbaekseung

Hat hat tteugeo tteugeo geonbae jjayo



Cheonjangeul ttulko nara shine a light

Neukkim itge shyalalla



Shintoburi

Come and get it

Come and get it

Come and get it

Bul bul buriya
